functionality.name: Postal Code
functionality.description: A feature to search, validate, and manage postal codes using detailed address input.

requirements.description: The system must allow users to search for a postal code by entering address details (state, city, street name).
The system must provide a list of matching results with their respective postal codes and addresses.
The system must allow users to select a specific postal code from the search results.
The system must allow users to edit or correct the address details if no results are found or if they entered incorrect data.
The system must prevent submission of incomplete or incorrect data.
The system must display detailed address information to complete the selected postal code.
The system must provide an option to skip entering a postal code.

epics.description: Search for postal codes using address details.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to input address details (state, city, and street name) to search for a postal code.

tasks.description: Design the UI to allow users to input state, city, and street name.
Implement field validations to ensure all mandatory fields are filled correctly.
Create an API endpoint to fetch postal code results based on input details.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want the system to notify me if the input fields are incomplete or invalid before performing the search.

epics.description: Display and select postal codes from search results.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to view a list of results with matching postal codes and addresses after a search.

tasks.description: Design a UI to display search results in a list with postal code and address information.
Implement a clickable button or link for each result to allow selection of a postal code.
Add logic to dynamically update the search results as users modify input details.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to select a specific postal code from the search results.

tasks.description: Implement functionality to store the selected postal code and proceed to the next step.

epics.description: Edit and validate address input details.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify my input details if the system finds no results or if I realize I made a mistake.

tasks.description: Add an 'Edit' button to allow users to return to the input form and modify address details.
Ensure input validations are reapplied when modified data is submitted.

epics.description: Complete address details for the selected postal code.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to enter additional details to ensure delivery accuracy.

tasks.description: Design a UI to capture additional address details, including optional fields such as neighborhood and complement.
Validate these additional fields for consistency and correctness.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want an option to skip entering the postal code for unlisted or incomplete addresses.

tasks.description: Add a 'Skip' button that allows users to proceed without entering a postal code.
